scripts.prepare: yarn format && yarn contracts && yarn compile
scripts.start: yarn compile && node ./dist/index.js start --ethereum http://localhost:8545 --graph-node-admin-endpoint http://localhost:8020/ --graph-node-status-endpoint http://localhost:8030/graphql --external-endpoint https://best-indexer-ever.eth --mnemonic "myth like bonus scare over problem client lizard pioneer submit female collect"
